The user creates a condensed surge of lightning in their fist. Upon doing so, the user thrusts it forward, unleashing a powerful lightning bolt. It can also be conducted by a [[Water Release Bullet: Orca|water source]] to hit multiple targets. 

== Trivia ==
* In the trailers for ''[[Boruto: Naruto the Movie]]'', when [[Boruto Uzumaki]] uses this technique through his [[Shinobi Gauntlet]], it makes the unique sound that the [[Chidori]] makes, while in the movie, it sounds like regular lightning.
